channel.title: Reporting a server
channel.description:
Im here to report Rune Dayz.
As on the forums said of getting sponserd by moparscape you may not sell staff or items for money. Well this server does ( rune - dayz .com (with no space between them) ) They are receiving over 500$ a month and i think that is illegal and they are breaking the rules.
Your welcome
MM!

item.title: Reporting a server
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Message an administrator, moparisthebest is the only one that can deal with this.

Read full topic
